title: Kozhu Kozhu Lyrics Theeya Velai Seiyyanum Kumaru Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Prakash, Priya Hemesh
Song: Kozhu Kozhu
Music : C. Sathya
Lyrics: Pa Vijay
Movie: Theeya Velai Seiyyanum Kumaru		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Kozhu kozhu porandhavaley
mozhu mozhunu valandhavaley
muzhusa nee kedaicha enna seiven

Kulu kulunu siripavaley
gilu gilunu irupavaley
sogusa nee kidacha enna seiven
kanna kuli inikka naan appadiye saapuduven
neju kuli neratha naa appadiye alliduven

Nee thee thee, thoonda nee
ennthaan alliko
vazhiko ichiko pichiko vachiko

Nee nee nee jill raani
mellathaan mennuko
munnuko pinnuko ennayum kattiko

nee ennako naan unako
neradi kiruko
un kiruko meliruko
anjadi thalliko

Hey appadi ippadi thaan
enna kattika muttikathaan
mella kaikoduthaan kaikoduthaan
manasayum keduthaan

Kaa kaa kaa nee aavakka
onnumey othukaa thathaka
puthaka pithaka pithaka

Tha thaa thaa kanpaarthu thaa
kandippa kandippa kannathil
kandippa muthathil vanjippaa

Aithalakka nee ennaku nenjila sulukka
thummalukkaa unkanakkaa pogudhu erakka
adi ennadi ennadiyo
rendu kannadi kannadiyo
adhu meen kadiyo
thaen kadiyo
veesuraa vediyo

Kozhu kozhu porandhavaley
mozhu mozhunu valandhavaley
muzhusa nee kedaicha enna seiven

kanna kuli inikka
naan appadiye appadiyesaapuduven
neju kuli neratha
naa appadiye appadiye alliduvenEnglish Translation
